mapper.select: SELECT a.dtlCD AS mon , IFNULL(b.inOutSignYMD,'') AS inOutSignYMD , IFNULL(b.wbInOutCal,0) AS wbInOutCal , IFNULL(b.wbInOutShip,0) AS wbInOutShip FROM( SELECT '01' AS dtlCD UNION ALL SELECT '02' UNION ALL SELECT '03' UNION ALL SELECT '04' UNION ALL SELECT '05' UNION ALL SELECT '06' UNION ALL SELECT '07' UNION ALL SELECT '08' UNION ALL SELECT '09' UNION ALL SELECT '10' UNION ALL SELECT '11' UNION ALL SELECT '12' ) AS a LEFT JOIN( SELECT CONVERT(a.inOutSignYMD, CHAR(7)) AS inOutSignYMD , SUBSTRING(CONVERT(a.inOutSignYMD, CHAR(7)),6,2) AS dtlCD , SUM(a.gradeTOTInOutCal) AS wbInOutCal -- 전산 수량 , SUM(a.gradeTOTInOutShip) AS wbInOutShip -- 입력 수량 FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a WHERE IFNULL(a.inOutSignYMD,'') <> '' AND a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND CONVERT(a.inOutSignYMD, CHAR(4))=#{yy} GROUP BY CONVERT(a.inOutSignYMD, CHAR(7)) )AS b ON a.dtlCD=b.dtlCD;

SELECT CONVERT(inOutSignYMD, CHAR(4)) AS yy FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst WHERE jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND deptCD=#{deptCD} AND IFNULL(CONVERT(inOutSignYMD, CHAR(4)),'') <> '' GROUP BY CONVERT(inOutSignYMD, CHAR(4)) ORDER BY CONVERT(inOutSignYMD, CHAR(4)) DESC

SELECT subj, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0002',a.subj,'E','') AS subjname , inOutSignYMD, DATE_FORMAT(inOutSignYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutSignYMDT , SUM(wbInOutShip) AS wbInOutShip, SUM(rewbInOutShip) AS rewbInOutShip, SUM(wbInOutShip)+SUM(rewbInOutShip) AS totship FROM( SELECT jisaCD, deptCD, subj, inOutSignYMD ,CASE WHEN inOutReqCD <> '13' THEN gradeTOTInOutShip ELSE '0' END AS wbInOutShip -- 입력 수량 ,CASE WHEN inOutReqCD = '13' THEN gradeTOTInOutShip ELSE '0' END AS rewbInOutShip -- 긴급교재 입력 FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a WHERE IFNULL(inOutSignYMD,'') <> '' AND jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND deptCD=#{deptCD} AND CONVERT(inOutSignYMD, CHAR(7))= CONCAT(#{yy},'-',#{mm}) )AS a GROUP BY subj, inOutSignYMD

SELECT aidx, jisaCD, deptCD, subj, subjname , inOutReqYMD, DATE_FORMAT(inOutReqYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutReqYMDT , userFstName, inOutReqNote, InOutCal, InOutShip , inOutSignYMD, DATE_FORMAT(inOutSignYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutSignYMDT , (InOutCal-InOutShip) AS balance FROM( SELECT a.aidx, a.jisaCD, a.deptCD , a.subj, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0002',a.subj,'E','') AS subjname , a.inOutReqYMD, b.userFstName , a.inOutReqNote, a.gradeTOTInOutCal AS InOutCal , CASE WHEN a.SignID <> '' AND a.inOutSignYMD <> '' THEN a.gradeTOTInOutShip ELSE 0 END AS InOutShip , a.inOutSignYMD FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.Users AS b ON a.regID = b.userId WHERE a.inOutReqCD = '13' AND a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND CONVERT(a.inOutReqYMD, CHAR(4))=#{yy} )AS a ORDER BY inOutReqYMD

SELECT a.inOutReqYMD, DATE_FORMAT(a.inOutReqYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutReqYMDT , b.subj, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(b.jisaCD,'0002',b.subj,'E','') AS subjname , b.wbName, b.wbInOutCal , CASE WHEN a.SignID <> '' AND a.inOutSignYMD <> '' THEN b.wbInOutShip ELSE 0 END AS InOutShip , c.userFstName , a.inOutSignYMD, DATE_FORMAT(a.inOutSignYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutSignYMDT , a.inOutReqNote FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutDtl AS b ON a.aidx = b.fidx LEFT JOIN globalbiz.Users AS c ON b.regID = c.userId WHERE b.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND b.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND a.aidx=#{aidx}
